description.p: A Document_definition is one of potentially more alternative representations of a Document_version. It represents a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using different formats.
description.eg: A version of a logical document, which contains a shape model, may be represented in the different native formats of two 3D CAD systems.
description.p: Each Document_definition is a Digital_document_definition or a Physical_document_definition.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: The id specifies the identifier of the Document_definition.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The description specifies additional information about the Document_definition.

explicit.name: associated_document_version
explicit.description: The associated_document_version specifies the version of the logical document that is being represented.

entity.name: Digital_document_definition
entity.description: A Digital_document_definition is a type ofDocument_definition. It represents a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using a digital representation format. A digital document definition may consist of one or many component digital files.

explicit.name: file
explicit.description: The file specifies a computer interpretable realization of the Digital_document_definition.

entity.name: Physical_document_definition
entity.description: A Physical_document_definition is a type of Document_definition. It represents a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using a physical representation format. A physical document definition may consist of one or many component hardcopy files.

explicit.name: component
explicit.description: The component specifies the physical realization of the Physical_document_definition.
